articles.title: Akani Simbine breaks SA and African 100m record in Hungary - News24
articles.description: South African sprinter Akani Simbine is reaching peak form ahead of the Olympic Games in Tokyo as he obliterated the field in a 100m event in Hungary.
articles.content:
South African sprinter Akani Simbine is reaching peak form ahead of the Olympic Games in Tokyo as he obliterated the field in a 100m event at the Gyulai Istvan Memorial meet in Hungary on Tuesday.

articles.title: Lions tour in chaos as Springboks coach Nienaber among 11 new positive cases and Bulls game off - Independent.ie
articles.description: The Lions' third fixture in South Africa against the Blue Bulls in Pretoria on Saturday has been postponed after four players and one member of staff tested positive. The game may be refixed for Wednesday, July 21.

articles.title: Wow: South African ‘mega-telescope’ discovers TWENTY new galaxies! - The South African
articles.description: The SA-based MeerKAT telescope has made a discovery that will shape the way astronomers study new galaxies going forward - and the photos are stunning!

articles.description: HIV positive people fear losing access to free treatment services as Kenya coasts towards a crisis while donor funding declines amid insufficient domestic funds, reveals a NationNewsplex review of HIV financing.
